metadata.title: ULTRALAST ULN423AAASL - 2/3 AAA (Two Thirds Triple A Battery) Solar Batteries for Outdoor Solar Lights - NICAD 1.2 Volt, 150mAh, Rechargeable Battery Pack for Garden Lighting - Recharges Up to 1000x
features: Reliable Power At All Times - Had enough of 2/3 AAA rechargeable batteries for solar lights that quickly get drained? Our 1.2V 150mAh 2/3AAA battery pack is designed to deliver long-lasting power.
Year-Round Use - Power up your devices with solar lights battery packs that stand the test of time. With high-quality cells, these outdoor rechargeable batteries may be recharged up to 1000 times.
Safe Use - Prolong the lifespan of your lamps with these 2/3 AAA rechargeable solar batteries. With anti-undervoltage technology, each rechargeable battery for solar lights boasts a leakproof design.
Must-Have For Your Home - Your gadgets deserve a reliable set of 2/3 AAA solar rechargeable batteries. Use each battery for solar light for your flash light, electric toothbrush, or shaver.
A Wise Purchase - Make the most out of your money by stocking up on NICAD sun rechargeable batteries from a brand that you can trust. We are a supplier that has been around for over 30 years now.
description: Do your solar lights dim out or lose power after just a few hours of use?

While solar lights mainly rely on the sun to work, they still need the right type of batteries to function properly. Using ordinary batteries for your solar-powered lamps can shorten their lifespan or lead to poor lighting performance over time. With so many choices available, choosing the right battery pack for your solar lights is easier said than done. Our NICAD rechargeable batteries make the perfect choice for your outdoor lighting needs.
Enjoy strong and stable battery performance with the ULTRALAST ULN423AAASL 2/3AAA Rechargeable Batteries.

Each pack contains four rechargeable 1.2V 150mAh batteries that are tailored to meet the high energy demands of your outdoor solar lamps. With their high-quality cells, you can count on these batteries to be a stable power source for outdoor light fixtures and electronic devices. Your solar lights work best when they use all-weather batteries. Our rechargeable batteries hold a charge well with minimal power loss. You need not worry about the batteries completely drying up during rainy days or cloudy weather. Our NICAD batteries may be recharged up to 1000 times without losing their efficiency. Combining a leakproof seal with an under-voltage protection technology, these batteries are perfectly safe to be used on your lights and devices throughout the year.
Need more time to decide? Here are more reasons to choose this pack of batteries:
- Made in observance of UL and UN38.3 quality and safety standards - True to capacity, long service life - Built for all-season use - Thoughtful gift for homeowners who have solar outdoor lights
Power up your devices with high-performance batteries. Add the ULTRALAST ULN423AAASL 2/3AAA Rechargeable Batteries to your cart NOW!
